title: placed bronze IV in flex
body:
lol. i ain't even mad bruh everyone down here is even worse than you'd think. 

i went from having to fight 3 plats per flex queue placement game to being placed in bronze 4. seems about right

guess i'll have some fun climbing. people say you can't escape this elo but if you are able to murder everyone repeatedly and casually stroll up to their nexus it seems pretty straight forward.....

honestly i might just keep solo flex queuing if my games are gonna be this much of a shit show lol the enemy support ran TP support thresh, AP shaco mid, it was  just silly AF

i now know why wukong360 likes it down here so much. its like intermediate bots.....
